Posts.Content: Caryn, you look beautiful, your hair is as soft as moleskin, so you keep wearing the pink DM's and stuff everyone else.  It is unfortunate that some chose to stare but they dont understand and I truly believe they never will unless they get to be on this awful boat we are all in on this group  xx   ****Ladies I can highly recommend the Benefit Mascara, Caryns' lashes were LUSH! I will definitely be investing in some anytime soon!****
Posts.Title: going Commando !!!!!
